header: Apple MacBook Air (13-inch Retina display, 1.6GHz dual-core Intel Core i5, 128GB) - Gold (Renewed)
description: The product is refurbished, fully functional, and in excellent condition. This pre-owned product has been professionally inspected, in "Excellent condition". The screen and body show no signs of cosmetic damage visible from 12 inches away.
